outerHTML:
OpenObserve LXC

OpenObserve is a simple yet sophisticated log search, infrastructure monitoring, and APM solution.

To create a new Proxmox VE OpenObserve LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update OpenObserve, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/openobserve.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 512MiB RAM - 3GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡

Credentials: cat /opt/openobserve/data/.env

OpenObserve Interface: IP:5080
